content:
SocketShutdown Enum

Definition

Defines constants that are used by the stem.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown* method.

In this Article

public enum SocketShutdown
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SocketShutdown

Remarks

The SocketShutdown enumeration defines the values that can be passed to the Shutdown method.

Fields

Both

Disables a Socket for both sending and receiving. This field is constant.
Receive

Disables a Socket for receiving. This field is constant.
Send

Disables a Socket for sending. This field is constant.
